attributes.action: Re-Nationalise the water, electricity and gas companies in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Making this happen would make the proposer a national hero. No more utility red-tape and middle men and no shareholders to pay would mean all profits could be used to improve our utilities and to protect those unable to afford 30% + rises. A government that proposed this brave move - would surely win the next General Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
